title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
creator_credit: Indian Paintbrush, Fox Searchlight Pictures, Alfonso Gomez-Rejon, Dan Fogelman, Jesse Andrews, Gerald Sullivan, Jeremy Dawson and Steven M. Rales
brief_description: Greg is coasting through senior year of high school as anonymously as possible, avoiding social interactions like the plague while secretly making spirited, bizarre films with Earl, his only friend. But both his anonymity and friendship threaten to unravel when his mother forces him to befriend a classmate with leukemia.

constellations_other.name: Making home movies
constellations_other.description: Home movies have inspired the form and plots of narrative cinema.
